DOC.brief_summary: To investigate efficacy and safety of pemetrexed as second or third line therapy in patients with non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC).
DOC.brief_title: To Investigate Efficacy and Safety of Pemetrexed as Second or Third Line Therapy in Patients With Non-small Cell Lung Cancer (NSCLC)
DOC.criteria: Clinical stage III or IV Previously treated with one or two chemotherapeutic regimens Performance status: 02 Inability or unwillingness to take folic acid or vitamin B12 supplementation
